name: Dower Tefense (MyLifeIsPotatooo)
description:
Dower Tefense is a game, which uses concept of tower defense(towers protecting base from enemies that are walking on one path), but we added a player. Player can protect the base too and thus help towers. Player can build tower and use multiple weapons(can be bought from shop). Also map has 4 paths to the base, so player needs to be quick.

Authors: Juraj Zalabai (Programmer, 2D art),
                Martin Kukučka(Programmer)
                Adrián Kabáč(Programmer)

You can play this game with multiple tactics. Are you going to use more towers, are you more focused on strategy ? Or will you rely on your aim ?
You can always choose different tactics, combine them, try new weapons, towers, difficulties and modes.
